pullRequest.title: /_cat/shards support path stats
pullRequest.bodyText: /_cat/shards cant support path stats. so where path.data uses multiple paths,  _cat/shards can be used to view the path of each shard

nodes.bodyText: Please move arguments to single line (you can extract ShardRoutingState to variable to make it more readable)
restController is not really used here, it can be removed
